column1: Smoque BBQ////It may have been a mistake to try the most flavorful thing first
column2: but it was just the cleanest
column3: so I started here. The sausage was great. First bite
column4: and you got all the smoky flavor and all salty goodness from it. Though it was good
column5: it didn't set itself apart from your run of the mill store-bought sausages on the grill. For a first bite
column6: this sausage was excellent. If you take 2 bites in a row
column7: the saltiness starts getting to you. You know
column8: I think this would be great on a bun. And don't try putting BBQ sauce on this
